code: import'../styles/FlightList.css';import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FlightList=()=>{const[flights,setFlights]=useState([]);const apiUrl="https://reservas-avion-back.vercel.app/";useEffect(()=>{const fetchFlights=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(apiUrl,"/v1/listarViajes"));if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setFlights(data);}else{console.error('Error al obtener la lista de vuelos');}}catch(error){console.error('Error al enviar la solicitud:',error);}};fetchFlights();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flightListContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"flightListTitle",children:"Lista de Vuelos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"flightList",children:flights.map((flight,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flightListItem",children:["Origen: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flightDetail",children:flight.origen}),", Destino: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flightDetail",children:flight.destino}),", D\xEDa: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flightDetail",children:flight.dia})]},index))})]});};export default FlightList;
